entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023
